records.QueryText: Information about Gummosis Control in Mango tree ...?
records.KccAns: Kisan bhai ap aam ke 10 sal ke ped me  - 250 gram copper sulphate + 250 gram gram Zinc sulphate + 125 gram borex + 100 gram bujha hua choona aam ke ped me thala banakar dale .

records.KccAns: Contact the nearest nationalized bank, branch for more information.

After plowing the summer, 2-3 plants should be prepared for the farm. Also, the strong embankment of the farm should also be made so that the rain water can be stored in the field for a long time. If drying is done as green manure, then the phosphorus should also be used as it is sown. Irrigate the field a week before sowing / transplanting of paddy, so that the weeds should be grown, after this sowing / plowing, plow the fields in the field.

records.QueryText: Information regarding seed treatment of Paddy?
records.KccAns: Soak the selected seed in 10 litres of water containing 20 gm bavistan (Carbendazim) 50WP and 1 gm. Streptocycline for 8-10 hours before sowing.dry the seed in shade and sow the seed immediately.

records.QueryText: Information  regarding control of motha weed in direct sowing paddy ?
records.KccAns: To control weeds in direct sowing paddy after 20-25 days sowing spray nominee gold/macho (Bispyribac-sodium 10% SC) or 8 gram almix 100 ml in 150 liters of water per acre.(0.66 ml per liter of water).
